text: Nikolai Alekseyevich Manoshin (; 6 March 1938 â€“ 10 February 2022) was a Soviet footballer and coach. Manoshin was born in Moscow, Russia. He played for the Soviet Union national team eight times between 1960 and 1961. He also played for FC Torpedo Moscow and PFC CSKA Moscow. Manoshin began his career in 1956 and he retired in 1991. Manoshin died on 10 February 2022 in Moscow, aged 83. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian football managers Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Soviet football managers Category:Soviet footballers
title: Nikolai Manoshin
